Articles.Content:
I went into orbit this afternoon, and...this 

![6QBAbwq.png](http://i.imgur.com/6QBAbwq.png)

As you can see, from the highlight, I can't take a crew report. It's not active. Right clicking my goo containers brings up no options, and I can't EVA either. (my buildings are advanced enough to allow it. I've EVA'd on my sub orbital flights.) I have electric charge, which was the first thing I thought might be wrong.

Any ideas?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-10T20:54:09Z" title="05/10/2015 08:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 10, 2015</time> by Starchaser**

DOH!

Thanks. 

I seem to be winning the "Too dumb to play the game" awards no matter what I'm playing today. I'm going to stay off of Elite, so I don't crash my cobra into a station.

> 
> Still timewarping. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Heh, yeah, this is your problem. Happens to me sometimes to, and it sucks when you can't turn on your engines and you miss your maneuver node... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
